properties.description: Every Thursday 10am - 12noon, complimentary tea, coffee and biscuits. properties.address: Whitnash Methodist Church, Leamington Spa, Warwickshire CV31 2JJ
properties.description: A space to talk and to listen. Being there, listening and making others feel welcome can change lives, more than that it can save lives. Come and say hello at Whitnash Methodist Church every Thursday between 11.30am-1.30pm. properties.address: Bishopton Community Centre, Drayton Ave, Stratford-upon-Avon CV37 9PB
properties.description:
We are a friendly bunch of people always looking to welcome new folk. We have different activities each week alongside regular seated exercise. We have hot drinks and cake, with chat and company. All ages and abilities welcome. No charge for anything.

The centre has free WiFi and is an accessible venue with a disabled toilet and no steps anywhere. There is also a shower available to use if required.
